SELECT br.id, br.user_id as userId, br.book_id as bookId, COALESCE(b.book_name, '未知图书') as bookName, COALESCE(u.name, '未知用户') as userName, br.borrow_time as borrowDate, br.due_time as dueDate, br.return_time as returnDate, CASE WHEN br.status = 0 THEN 'borrowing' WHEN br.status = 1 THEN 'returned' WHEN br.status = 2 THEN 'overdue' ELSE 'unknown' END as status, CASE WHEN br.status = 0 AND br.due_time < NOW() THEN true ELSE false END as overdue FROM borrow_record br LEFT JOIN book b ON br.book_id = b.book_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON br.user_id = u.id ORDER BY br.borrow_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow_record(user_id, book_id, borrow_time, due_time, return_time, status, renew_count) VALUES(#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{borrowTime}, #{dueTime}, #{returnTime}, #{status}, #{renewCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE borrow_record SET user_id = #{userId}, book_id = #{bookId}, borrow_time = #{borrowTime}, due_time = #{dueTime}, return_time = #{returnTime}, status = #{status}, renew_count = #{renewCount} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM borrow_record WHERE status = 0 AND due_time < NOW() ORDER BY due_time ASC
